channel.title: How retarded people are in my city
channel.description:
Just saw it on the news, people attach chains to their car, then to pay phones, and rip the pay phone off of the poll/wall and take it home, get the money out of it, and keep it.
Amazingly you get like $300+ from each one but still, like what the fuck?

item.title: How retarded people are in my city
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:1, topic:98388”]Just saw it on the news, people attach chains to their car, then to pay phones, and rip the pay phone off of the poll/wall and take it home, get the money out of it, and keep it.

Amazingly you get like $300+ from each one but still, like what the fuck?[/quote]I lol’d! Nothing interesting happens here, I guess the people over here are too stuck up.

Read full topic
item.source: How retarded people are in my city

item.title: How retarded people are in my city
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

i was at an amusement park once, and i put in my dollar and tried to hack the machine (by putting in my dollar, pressing a letter, and then pressing the coin return slot (should give you back the dollar, but my machine was old) and after gettting the dollar you press the last number/letter and you should get the item for free.) but it didn’t work. i walked away and about 2 min later, i look over and the machine is spitting out like $50 in quarters. it was insane!

Read full topic
item.source: How retarded people are in my city

item.title: How retarded people are in my city
item.dc:creator: @White_Castle White Castle
item.description:
@White_Castle wrote:

Hahaha, all you have to do is stuff a little tissue paper up the coin return in any vending machine. I made about $17 over the course of a week doing this :).

Read full topic
item.source: How retarded people are in my city

item.title: How retarded people are in my city
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Maybe you’re not in the exact region of the state which has drug use.

I myself have seen this thing going on. Close by my school theres a pay phone ripped off. They were takeing pictures of it and putting it on the news a few weeks ago.

Read full topic
item.source: How retarded people are in my city

item.title: How retarded people are in my city
item.dc:creator: @slooshismyname slooshismyname
item.description:
@slooshismyname wrote:

Hmmm that does seem like an ‘OK’ way for a petty criminal to gain a few extra coins.

My town just has kids boosting bicycles and has the rank of #1 or are in the top #3 of the State in drug use.

Read full topic
item.source: How retarded people are in my city

item.title: How retarded people are in my city
item.dc:creator: @kurt pixels
item.description:
@kurt wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:2, topic:98388”]Pretty inefficient way of doing it, much easier to install some sort of device to catch change - this way they don’t beef up the security of the machines and you can keep hitting the same area.

This has been done in our area before, I had a payphone not give me my change back and noticed someone had made some kind of pot to catch the money - got my change back and a little extra (shame it wasn’t more).

It was quite professionally made, I did wonder if there was some company out there producing these for aspiring criminals, since most payphones are the same anyway.[/quote]

Vive la homeless

Read full topic
item.source: How retarded people are in my city

item.title: How retarded people are in my city
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Lmao, they are actually having a problem with this downtown right now. Except people are pulling garbage cans away for some reason. Just for fun I guess.

Mopman:

Pretty inefficient way of doing it, much easier to install some sort of device to catch change - this way they don’t beef up the security of the machines and you can keep hitting the same area.

They do that here too. Except all they do is shove toilet paper up the coin return slot.

My community in general is stupid. It was designed to be a retirement town, but I guess at the same time there are a lot of kids. There’s no recreation here which probably explains why we have the largest drug per capita in my province. Well people here are so stupid that they recently voted the same mayor back. There hasn’t been a road paved for over 5 years. And believe me, the roads are in horrible condition. He also just brought us to a 13 million dollar debt(I think that was it, my memory is a little foggy). Thats a pretty bad debt considering our population is 14,000.

Read full topic
item.source: How retarded people are in my city

item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Pretty inefficient way of doing it, much easier to install some sort of device to catch change - this way they don’t beef up the security of the machines and you can keep hitting the same area.

This has been done in our area before, I had a payphone not give me my change back and noticed someone had made some kind of pot to catch the money - got my change back and a little extra (shame it wasn’t more).

It was quite professionally made, I did wonder if there was some company out there producing these for aspiring criminals, since most payphones are the same anyway.
